ComicInfo.Title: Volume 2
ComicInfo.Summary: An enemy from Master Splinter's past is back and hungry for revenge. To get it, he'll summon the most dangerous foe that the Turtles have ever encountered-the Collectors, shape-shifting demons that can pass through dimensions at will and cannot be stopped once they have been summoned to harvest a soul. To save themselves, the Turtles team up with the Ghostbusters, the only people who have ever faced them and lived to tell the tale, in a battle that turns into a chase across dimensions both incredible and terrifying.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-21 11:41:43. [CVDB661060]
ComicInfo.Characters: Bill Music, Bronson, Dan Welker, Darius Dun, Donatello, Dracula, Egon Spengler, Glam, Grunge, Harold LaMarche, Janine Melnitz, Leonardo, Master Splinter, Metal, Michelangelo, Peter Venkman, Punk, Raphael, Ray Stantz, Rookie, Shibano-Sama, Smaug, Stingy Jack, Tang Shen, Winston Zeddemore
ComicInfo.Teams: Collectors, Dragons, Foot Clan, Ghostbusters, Ghostbusturtles, Punk Frogs, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, Vampires, Vikings, Yeti
ComicInfo.Locations: Heaven, Limbo (hell), Manhattan, New York City, New York State, North America, Zoo Amsterdam
